description:
pep8 failures are no longer causing run_tests.sh to exit with status 1.

I think this has been the case since the coverage testing was added.  run_tests.sh is not set -e, so it falls through to the next bit of the script (coverage) regardless of whether pep8 succeeds.
title: pep8 failures do not cause the tests to fail
